<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/090728ad4d54287c911894ef42bfe92844ce0fa5|patch 8.2.2169: Vim9: test leaves file behind>
patch 8.2.2169: Vim9: test leaves file behind

Problem:    Vim9: test leaves file behind.
Solution:   Rename script files. (Dominique Pellé, closes #7511)
            Use try/finally.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2169: Vim9: test leaves file behind · vim/vim@090728a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2169: Vim9: test leaves file behind · vim/vim@090728a
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: test leaves file behind. Solution: Rename script files. (Dominique Pellé, closes #7511) Use try/finally.

Solution:   Remember the destination type. (closes #7506)

patch 8.2.2166: auto format doesn't work when deleting text

Problem:    Auto format doesn't work when deleting text.
Solution:   Make "x" trigger auto format. (closes #7504)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2166: auto format doesn't work when deleting text · vim/vim@d0a1dee
attachments.text: Problem: Auto format doesn't work when deleting text. Solution: Make "x" trigger auto format. (closes #7504)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/17f700ac8b55f27ddb519ecaa8acaa43fc1ae60a|patch 8.2.2164: Vim9: autoload function doesn't work in uppercased sc…>
patch 8.2.2164: Vim9: autoload function doesn't work in uppercased script

Problem:    Vim9: autoload function doesn't work in script that starts with
            an upper case letter.
Solution:   Check for the autoload character. (closes #7502)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2164: Vim9: autoload function doesn't work in uppercased sc… · vim/vim@17f700a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2164: Vim9: autoload function doesn't work in uppercased sc… · vim/vim@17f700a
attachments.text: …ript Problem: Vim9: autoload function doesn't work in script that starts with an upper case letter. Solution: Check for the autoload character. (closes #7502)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/13656f02e457fb68cd7e72412fc24ccac02fb06e|patch 8.2.2163: crash when discarded exception is the current exception>
patch 8.2.2163: crash when discarded exception is the current exception

Problem:    Crash when discarded exception is the current exception.
Solution:   Compare the execption with current_exception. (closes #7499)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2163: crash when discarded exception is the current exception · vim/vim@13656f0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2163: crash when discarded exception is the current exception · vim/vim@13656f0
attachments.text: Problem: Crash when discarded exception is the current exception. Solution: Compare the execption with current_exception. (closes #7499)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/03290b8444b69c6d7307755770467bc488384e1a|patch 8.2.2162: Vim9: Cannot load or store autoload variables>
patch 8.2.2162: Vim9: Cannot load or store autoload variables

Problem:    Vim9: Cannot load or store autoload variables.
Solution:   Add ISN_LOADAUTO and ISN_STOREAUTO. (closes #7485)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2162: Vim9: Cannot load or store autoload variables · vim/vim@03290b8
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2162: Vim9: Cannot load or store autoload variables · vim/vim@03290b8
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: Cannot load or store autoload variables. Solution: Add ISN_LOADAUTO and ISN_STOREAUTO. (closes #7485)
